supplyDemandQuery.title: Final energy by aggregate end-use sector and fuel
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type='sector' and ((@name='building' or @name='industry' or @name='transportation') or (exists(child::keyword/@final-energy)))]//*[@type='input' and not (@name='renewable')]/demand-physical[@unit='EJ']/node()

supplyDemandQuery.title: Refined liquid fuel production by technology
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type = 'sector' and ((@name='refined liquids enduse' or @name='refined liquids industrial' or @name='refining'))]/*[@type = 'subsector']/*[@type = 'technology' and not (@name='refined liquids enduse' or @name = 'refined liquids industrial')]//*[@type='output' (:collapse:)]/physical-output/node()

supplyDemandQuery.title: Primary energy with CCS (Direct Equivalent)
supplyDemandQuery.comments: WARNING: Results are slightly inflated due to improper secondary-output accounting

supplyDemandQuery.title: Electricity generation by aggregate technology
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type = 'sector' (: collapse :) and ((@name='electricity' or @name='elect_td_bld' or @name='industrial energy use' or (@name='base load generation') or (@name='peak generation') or (@name = 'intermediate generation') or (@name='subpeak generation')) )]//*[@type = 'technology' and not (@name='electricity_td_bld' or @name='electricity' or @name='elect_td_bld')]/*[@type='output' (:collapse:) and (@name='electricity' or @name='elect_td_bld' or @name='base load generation' or @name='intermediate generation' or @name='subpeak generation' or @name='peak generation')]/physical-output/node()

supplyDemandQuery.title: Hydrogen production by technology
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type = 'sector' and ((@name='H2 Central Production' or @name='H2 Forecourt Production' or @name='H2 central production' or @name='H2 forecourt production') )]/*[@type = 'subsector']//*[@type = 'technology']//*[@type='output']/physical-output/node()

supplyDemandQuery.title: Electricity generation by technology (inc solar roofs)
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type = 'sector' (: collapse :) and ((@name='electricity' or @name='elect_td_bld' or @name='industrial energy use' or (@name='base load generation') or (@name='peak generation') or (@name = 'intermediate generation') or (@name='subpeak generation')) )]//*[@type = 'technology' and not (@name='electricity_td_bld' or @name='electricity' or @name='elect_td_bld')]/*[@type='output' (:collapse:) and (@name='electricity' or @name='elect_td_bld' or @name='base load generation' or @name='intermediate generation' or @name='subpeak generation' or @name='peak generation')]/physical-output/node()

supplyDemandQuery.title: CO2 Emissions by enduse
Regional energy costs
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type = 'sector' and ((@name='regional oil' or @name='regional natural gas' or @name='regional coal' or @name='regional biomass' or @name='nuclearFuelGenIII' or @name='electricity'))]/cost/text()
